experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: As a Frontend Developer at Zollege, I work with a team of developers to translate design concepts into beautiful, dynamic and interesting user experiences.
highlights: Create feature rich applications using CSS, React and Bootstrap.
Obtain and handle data from the backend API using Fetch.
Utilize version control and collaborate with the team regarding design and planning.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: As a Frontend Developer at AD Creative Group, I am responsible for creating and maintaining beautiful, cohesive and user friendly web experiences. I work closely with the rest of the development team and our designers to deliver feature rich responsive websites.
highlights: Create custom themes and features using PHP, Wordpress, Javascript, HTML, CSS and Bootstrap, based on design layouts built with Photoshop and Illustrator.
Collaborate with the team regarding site design and planning.
Leverage accessibility checks to ensure best practices are followed.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: As a Frontend Developer at Fragment Labs, I worked closely with the development team on an application redesign. We focused on building an improved user experience with responsive design, while incorporating new features and functionality.
highlights: Created a beautiful frontend application using Vue and Bulma.
Obtained and handled data from the backend API using Axios.
Utilized version control and participated in team collaboration throughout the project.
